sections.heading: Authority
sections.text:
of State Land Registrar concerning exchange of state lands for lands of United

States.

sections.heading: Basis
sections.text: of exchange; reservation of mineral rights and easements.

sections.heading: Agreement
sections.text: concerning exchange not to surrender jurisdiction of State.

sections.heading: Authority
sections.text:
of State Land Registrar to exchange land of equal value or land whose value is

equalized by payment of money.
